item.title: The Waking of Haven（新規追加）
item.description: The Waking of Haven is a low-click action RTS with rogue-lite elements. Assume control of a champion lost in an enchanted forest, accompanied by a squad of loyal troops. Find resources, level up, upgrade your forces and fight through the ever-shifting pathways of the forest … or die trying.
item.content:encoded:
The Waking of Haven is a low-click action RTS with rogue-lite elements. Assume control of a champion lost in an enchanted forest, accompanied by a squad of loyal troops. Find resources, level up, upgrade your forces and fight through the ever-shifting pathways of the forest … or die trying.

item.title: Recursary（新規追加）
item.description: A 2D side-scrolling platformer focusing on exploration and adaptive combat within a procedurally generated world. The player has infinite lives but the world changes slightly with each respawn. The player's respawn location is always random unless a game mechanic is used to prevent it.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Digging Together（新規追加）
item.description: Digging Together is a laid-back co-op mining game where the only objective is to dig ever deeper, sell what you find, and keep upgrading your kit. Nothing more, nothing less. There’s no combat, no stealth, and no enemies. Just pure, satisfying excavation.

item.title: 封神模拟器（新規追加）
